text: a halloween party certainly would not be
complete without some mysterious food
and drinks with spooky colors here are a
few recipe ideas that you can prepare
for your kids to make their halloween
party more interesting and special
first let's dress up the sausages and
turn them into mummies in a large mixing
bowl combine 75 gram butter with 75
grams of all-purpose flour use your
hands to break the butter into smaller
chunks add 5 gram powder sugar a pinch
of salt and 35 ml of water and knit well
until the dough is formed cover with
plastic wrap and let rest for about 15
minutes in the refrigerator then take
out the dough briefly knead on a floured
working surface then roll out into a
thin disc and cut into strips
split the sausages halfway through in
half and use the dough strips to wrap
around them like mummies then put into
the freezer for about 10 minutes to set
then bake the sausage mummies for about
8 minutes
next add mayonnaise into a piping bag
squeeze out a little amount to make the
eyeballs for the mummies and then add
peppercorns to make the pupils look at
that the mummies look really cute and
scariest at the same time right and the
best party they taste so delicious with
the buttery golden crust and the
succulent sausages next recipe is some
crispy spring rolls shaped in form of
bats this is a great addition of asian
flavors to your halloween party firstly
soak 20 gram milk dried wooden mushrooms
in water to soften in a mixing bowl
combine the mince mixed finely chopped
woody mushrooms season with some stock
powder salt sugar and pepper and mix
well set aside for about 15 to 20
minutes cut spin roll wrappers into
square pieces place a scoop of the
fillings into the center folding the
opposite corners then fold the opposite
corners in a zigzag motion to form the
wings of the bat
then heat vegetable oils until bubbles
appear around the chopstick about 175
degrees celsius and deep fry the bad
spring rolls until golden brown
remove and leave to cool then also use
mayonnaise and pepper to make the eyes
for the bats you can place them on a
nest like this do they look scary or
cute let me know in the comments next is
avocado toast a very easy simple recipe
that you can make with your kids crush
the flesh of one avocado in a bowl
add juice of half a lime to prevent
browning season with some sugar salt and
olive oil mash and mix well
cut cherry tomato olives and baby radish
into slices cut a pickled baby cucumber
in half to make the noses trim two
corners of the sandwich bread to form
the head of the pirates spread the
avocado mesh on top top with the sliced
vegetables to make the eyes nose and
mouth for the pirates you can cut some
nori seaweed to make the hair and use
the walnut to make the ears of the
pirates just freely express your
creativity and design your own avocado
toast to impress the guests one more
very simple idea but will surely impress
any kid that are the spiders made from
oreo and m m's detach the oreos remove
the fillings and combine into a bowl add
a tablespoon of peanut butter and some
food colors of your choice mix well to
homogeneous and transfer into a piping
bag fill a thick layers of the fillings
onto one oreo biscuit place the other
one on top use the green mixture as the
glue to stick the m m's to make the eyes
of the spider for the legs of the spider
cut the trim part of the sandwich bread
into strips make a fold in the center
and stick to the cream to attach them to
the body of the spider cut some secret
into small rounds to make the pupils for
the eyes these spiders are especially
for chocolate lovers i hope you will try
out these interesting ideas to make your
halloween party this year's more special
don't forget to click like and share
this video with your friends thank you
for watching see you next time bye
[Music]
